00018     LT_Flicker=1,

00026     // Constants

00032 
00033     // Runtime variables
00034         float flickerVariation; // 25% flicker variation, reset once every 0.5 seconds
00035         float flickerSlowVariation; // 25% flicker variation, reset once every 1.0 seconds
00036         float resetTime;
00037     long double time;
00038 
00039

00041         flickerVariation(0), resetTime(0.5),
00042         flickerSlowVariation(0), time(0), interior(true),
00043         type(LT_Normal), radius(1.0)
